title: Identifying Outliers
body: The data here represents student grades on a chemistry exam. The stems are the tens places and the leaves are the ones places. For instance, the data point with stem $$7$$ and leaf $$7$$ represents a score of 77.\n##figure1.gif
lesson: 2.2 Stem-and-Leaf Graphs (Stemplots), Line Graphs, and Bar Graphs
